paragraphs.craft: Frontend engineer, trying to craft minimalist, <pixelPerfect>pixel-perfect</pixelPerfect> interfaces that feel simple and pleasant for users.
paragraphs.learn: As a young developer, I love to learn and keep improving. Always picking up new ideas in coding, UX, and creative patterns to build things that feel better than yesterday.
paragraphs.life: Outside the screen, I love discovering new food and restaurants, traveling, and building things with my hands, anything that lets me play, create, and reset my brain.

basics.name: Sabine Sun
basics.label: Frontend Engineer
basics.summary: Diligent and autonomous, I'm looking for a full-time frontend position starting in October 2024.

kiosk.name: Kiosk
kiosk.summary: Kiosk provides the software companies use to ensure CSRD compliance.

highlights.navigation-speed: Resolved critical bugs that cut navigation time from 4.62s to under 30ms, significantly improving the user experience.
highlights.design-system: Introduced a design system that ensures visual consistency and a smoother UX.
highlights.architecture-refactor: Redesigned the frontend architecture with a modular Domain-Driven approach (entities, services, data repositories) to improve maintainability and readability.

canal.name: Canal+
canal.summary: Canal+ is the media group behind the [myCanal](https://www.canalplus.com/) streaming platform. During my final-year internship, I worked on redesigning the in-app editorial articles.

highlights.streaming-development: Developed and maintained features for the myCanal streaming application.
highlights.library-version: Shipped a major version of the internal library used to generate editorial articles.
highlights.migration: Migrated class components to functional ones, added unit and functional tests, and maintained Storybook documentation.
highlights.maintainability: Improved code maintainability, modernized the UI/UX of news articles, and embedded accessibility best practices.

dcbrain.name: DCbrain
dcbrain.summary: [DCbrain](https://dcbrain.com/) is a startup that builds SaaS software to plan the supply chain. During this internship I contributed directly to product development by releasing new features.

highlights.component-design: Designed components alongside the designer and product manager.
highlights.kpi-card: Developed a KPI card and redesigned the sidebar to support hierarchical organization.
highlights.client-needs: Analyzed customer needs and quickly onboarded on the in-house framework.
highlights.modernization: Modernized the supply-chain planning SaaS interface.

episo.name: Episo
episo.description: Search engine for movies and TV shows
